info.name: Micro CRM Backend
info.description:
Complete API collection for Micro CRM Backend - Local Services CRM for freelancers and small businesses.

**Features:**
- Automatic JWT token management
- Built-in test assertions
- Environment variable auto-save
- Console logging for debugging

**Usage:**
1. Import collection and environment files
2. Select "Micro CRM Backend - Local" environment
3. Start backend server (`npm run start:dev`)
4. Run requests - tokens are managed automatically!

**Current Phase:** Sprint 1 - Phase 3 Complete ✅
- Authentication System ✅
- Clients Module with CRUD ✅

 * @returns {string} 201.user.plan - Subscription plan (FREE/PRO)
 * 
 * @throws {ConflictException} 409 - Email already registered

item.name: Clients

request.description:
/**
 * Creates a new client associated with the authenticated user.
 * 
 * @endpoint POST /clients
 * @auth Bearer Token (JWT)
 * 
 * @param {object} body - Client data
 * @param {string} body.name - Client name (required, max 255 chars)
 * @param {string} body.email - Client email (optional, must be valid email)
 * @param {string} body.phone - Client phone (optional, max 20 chars)
 * @param {string} body.notes - Additional notes (optional, max 1000 chars)
 * 
 * @returns {object} 201 - Client created successfully
 * @returns {string} 201.id - Client UUID
 * @returns {string} 201.name - Client name
 * @returns {string} 201.email - Client email
 * @returns {string} 201.phone - Client phone
 * @returns {string} 201.notes - Client notes
 * @returns {string} 201.userId - Associated user ID
 * @returns {string} 201.createdAt - Creation timestamp
 * @returns {string} 201.updatedAt - Last update timestamp
 * 
 * @throws {UnauthorizedException} 401 - Missing or invalid token
 * @throws {BadRequestException} 400 - Validation failed
 */

/**
 * Retrieves paginated list of clients for the authenticated user.
 * 
 * @endpoint GET /clients
 * @auth Bearer Token (JWT)
 * 
 * @param {number} query.page - Page number (optional, default: 1)
 * @param {number} query.limit - Items per page (optional, default: 10)
 * @param {string} query.search - Search by name (optional, case-insensitive)
 * 
 * @returns {object} 200 - Paginated client list
 * @returns {array} 200.data - Array of client objects
 * @returns {number} 200.total - Total number of clients
 * @returns {number} 200.page - Current page number
 * @returns {number} 200.limit - Items per page
 * 
 * @throws {UnauthorizedException} 401 - Missing or invalid token
 */

/**
 * Search clients by name with case-insensitive partial matching.
 * 
 * @endpoint GET /clients?search={query}
 * @auth Bearer Token (JWT)
 * 
 * @param {string} query.search - Search query for client name
 * 
 * @returns {object} 200 - Filtered client list with pagination
 */

/**
 * Retrieves a single client by ID.
 * 
 * @endpoint GET /clients/:id
 * @auth Bearer Token (JWT)
 * 
 * @param {string} path.id - Client UUID
 * 
 * @returns {object} 200 - Client data
 * @returns {string} 200.id - Client UUID
 * @returns {string} 200.name - Client name
 * @returns {string} 200.email - Client email
 * @returns {string} 200.phone - Client phone
 * @returns {string} 200.notes - Client notes
 * @returns {string} 200.userId - Associated user ID
 * @returns {string} 200.createdAt - Creation timestamp
 * @returns {string} 200.updatedAt - Last update timestamp
 * 
 * @throws {UnauthorizedException} 401 - Missing or invalid token
 * @throws {NotFoundException} 404 - Client not found or unauthorized
 */
